p: Figure 2 shows the relationship of the EO fractions of J. excelsa and the concentrations of its constituents with the distillation timeframes (DT). J. excelsa EO content (yield) was significantly higher during the first 5 min (0.29%) than in the DT onward 160–240 min ( Table 4). Generally, monoterpenes (α-pinene, limonene) were the predominant group of the EO constituents ( Table 4 and Table 5).
